name: Untitled Rhythm game Alpha
description:
A Rhythm game I am currently working on.

Blocks come from 4 directions and you have to press the key written on them(W/A/S/D or Up/Down/Left/Right) when they reach the Core(The White block in the center).

NOTE: Currently, there are NO LEVELS. But there is a built in LEVEL EDITOR that you can use to make levels and export them. You can also PLAY YOUR CUSTOM LEVELS from the main menu. THE PLAN is to get all the features in the level editor ready and then make levels
